Sugandika and Nagananda do nothing for the country as well the Nation. They are just lawyers  make money out of the innocent people. Where were these lawyers during 1971 and during 1987 when the government killed thousands of the youth of our country. Do they have appeared for the missing soldiers or the innocent civilians of our country. Where were they during the LTTE activities killed innocent people. Do they fight for the civilian rights of  the innocent citizens who died in a bomb blast. Do they make a voice against so called international NGO as well Tamil diaspora who wanted to be dived our country. Our foolish Sri Lankans forgot the past very quickly. If Sugandika and Nagands has a problem with the judicial system of our country, why Nagananda took so long to highlight or go against that? You foolish Srilankans must understand one thing, these people who dealt with foreign countries are being paid well to stop the collapse of this government as well electing a good and strong leader for our nation. Just go through the history. Teach your children about our great history. Let them understand the future of our Nation. Don't be foolish with this dirty lawyers. This is just a game playing wit SLVLOG.
